name: PAT_ENC_CALL_PRPTS
description: This table traces the Prompts (LPQ) records followed in the Protocol during clinical calls.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the patient call prompts.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date for the encounter in standard date format.

columns.name: CLICKED_LPQS
columns.description: The ID of the prompt followed during the call.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: A unique serial number for this encounter. This number is unique across all patients and encounters in the system.

columns.name: CLICKED_USER_ID
columns.description: User who clicked the corresponding prompt in CLICKED_LPQS column

columns.name: CLICKED_USER_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: PROMPT_CLICKED_DTTM
columns.description: Instant when the user in CLICKED_USER_ID clicked the prompt in CLICKED_LPQs column.
